content: this text is about a legal document called eot reciprocal rights involving a payment of €10000 mr l and mrs f have decided to get a divorce by mutual consent and have reached an agreement on various aspects such as property division custody of children and expenses related to the children they have also waived maintenance payments and future claims the agreement will take effect once the divorce is finalized they have chosen a specific court to file a joint petition for divorce and the costs of the proceedings will be divided equally between them the parties have declared their full legal capacity residence and domicile the notary has confirmed their identities and civil status based on official documents the parties acknowledge their right to choose another notary if they feel their interests are not properly represented they have given power of attorney to the notary for tax purposes the parties have made additional tax declarations and have accessed the notarial deed digitally through a secure website they have also requested a copy of the deed to be sent electronically which the notary will provide once all formalities are completed the notary has read and explained the entire deed and all parties have signed it
